items.text: back of a length on leg again, and strikes him on the pad. An excited appeal by the bowler, but the umpire was not interested
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: goes fuller that time, stays on the stumps, but he's able to turn it away to square leg for a quick single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: fuller on the stumps, and he waits for it and defends into the covers
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Masakadza, no run

items.text: got 'im No foot movement again from Hamilton, and went for the drive. It was a slower ball outside off, straightened a touch, enough to take a feather of an edge through to the keeper. Not the best shot to play when Zimbabwe's opening partnerships have been so shaky
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Masakadza, OUT

dismissal.text: H Masakadza c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Mohammad Saifuddin 14 (18b 2x4 0x6) SR: 77.77

items.text: back of  a length outside off, he defends it with soft hands towards point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven back but without much timing. Fizz gets a hand to it to slow its progress further
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: he was targetting cow corner there, but ended up connecting with air. back of a length outside off, and he tried to pull it away
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: back of a length coming into the batsman, he rises up and tucks it away to square leg for a single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: full on the stumps, he pats it with soft hands towards mid-on and they run through for a quick single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length ball, coming in a bit from outside off, he covers the line well but almost falls over while clipping it towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: not middled but over the ropes slower ball, and he didn't quite pick it up perfectly, went over the top but a bit too early into the shot. Still had enough on it to drop just beyond the rope at long-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Zhuwao, SIX runs

items.preText: Syed Kabir: "Saifuddin looks a much more composed and complete bowler after his earlier debut. Looks like a good bet to be Mashrafe's replacement if he continues. "
items.text: full ball on the stumps, turned away with his wrists and bottom-hand through midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: length ball outside off, well stroked but straight to cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: hint of a movement into the batsman, he plays it with an angled bat towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, he gets a thick inside edge that trickles to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, punched firmly but he can't get past the off-side cordon
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: goes too straight, allowing him to turn it away to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 2 runs

items.preText: Saif Tanmoy: "What speed Saifuddin is bowling at?" - his slower balls, and he's bowling a fair few, are in the 115-120 region. His normal balls are in 130-135 range mostly
items.text: pinged on the upper armshort ball, and he didn't duck quickly enough, that hit him just below the shoulder
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Zhuwao, 1 leg bye

items.text: full outside off, driven but straight to wide mid-off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: well fielded by short cover lovely cover drive by Taylor, but the man at short cover dived to his right to get a hand to it.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on the stumps, patted into the leg-side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: full on the pads, and turned away but can't find the gap. straight to the man at midwicket
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: full on the stumps, driven well again, but straight to mid-off. He's been timing a few shots well, but not getting them past the fielders
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: big appeal for caught behind back of a length on legstump, he tried to swivel and pull, but the ball went straight to the keeper. Mushfiqur appeal loud and long, but the umpire says no. and they don't go for the review
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: full on the stumps, he flicks it, but straight to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Zhuwao, no run
